author: Trent Darby
comment: Bus timing not accurate, can u all give LTA a wake up call? Pls add logic to remove buses from bus stops which are returning to the depo! (e.g 700A last bus at suntec Convention bus stop ) They don't fetch passengers! But the app shows it anyway. Learn that the hard way stranded past midnight. | Favourites should be first page | coming back, going out headers should have settings to auto hide.

author: Kaze Lim
comment: Been using this app for 2 months now. It's a good app but I can't get the notification to work no matter how I try. No notification for bus arrival, no notification for reaching destination as well. It just doesn't notify even when I've selected the necessary settings. My phone settings are also set to allow notification for this app. Using a Google pixel 2 xl.

author: Anton Karve
comment: The user interface is great, however the app itself is quite unstable. Once I leave the app it starts slowing down my phone, and always crashes eventually. If this bug is fixed the app would be perfect.

author: THE ZY
comment: This app is a nightmare to use in the morning, timings constantly changing,  time travelling backwards etc.  Other than that,  it works almost perfectly.   Update : Developer claims to have fixed it but problems are still persisting.

reply.author: Originally US - Mobile App Development Singapore
reply.content: Hi,, we have done the necessary upgrades and optimization. Thank you for your support. Would you mind revising your review?

author: Wai Kit Kok
comment: I subscribed for the paid version so that i can monitor the bus arrival time at notifications tab. It worked well previously but now no longer accurate and the time is frozen and won't update accordingly. Please fix this ASAP!

author: PEI LING TAN
comment: This apps is ok but dont know why, when i edited and hid the bus at certain bus stop, the hidden bus stop will still keep appearing! Is there any way to hide the buses in certain bus stop?

author: Rizam Ahmad Ariff
comment: Not accurate i miss my bus so many times and waited long for the bus like gundu. Two thumbs down!

author: Janice C
comment: The bus timings are inaccurate, especially during morning + evening peak hours. Timings at times don't load during morning peak hour.

author: Cookie Face
comment: Just missed a bus....disapointing and the app told me bus coming in 15mins. Award winning app like this...zzz fix pls very annoying

author: B G Chua
comment: The app shows sooner than realistic timing. There are timings they show which are inaccurate when the buses are still at the terminals.

author: melvin leong
comment: I waited a arrving bus in the app for more than 10mins. I cant believe this is award winning. Totally sucks

author: chee.khiam Tay
comment: The map features is useful. Tells me where I am and allows me to pinpoint the bus stop i intend to start my journey.

author: Reboot Myth
comment: Easy UI. Fast and reliable. Makes you wonder why there are people still anxiously looking out for their bus. Make good use of your smartphone, people!
I just can't load the arriving time this morning and it made me missed 2 buses..... Pls solve the issue.

author: Tong-Yu Kho
comment: It tells u in how many minutes the buses are coming but the problem is itz not that accurate like itz shows in 5 min the bus is coming next moment it shows 14 min and itz still at the bus interchange and then the next moment it says 6 min but still at the interchange and also the notification is not that accurate i put it to tell when the bus is coming in one minute when it says arriving already it stipl havent notify me please fix this

author: baba zaki
comment: I used to live in a big condo and i installed the app just for fun. And now i am a homeless man riding buses with info from the apps..download it if u want to be a hobo like me...also there are good promos too..

author: elise young
comment: Searching for bus service number results in bus stops instead... pls fix the bug

author: Keagan Tan
comment: It's a decent app and I've liked using it. The developers are quick in fixing bugs and the user experience has been largely ok.

author: Jereme K
comment: Not accurate. Says bus is arriving 2 minutes after bus has left stop.

author: Hwee San
comment: Pls update! The timing is inaccurate and make me miss my bus!

author: Samantha Tan
comment: Tracking trips feature doesn't work, keeps shutting down

author: Jenny Lim
comment: Occasionally got some hiccups otherwise worth 5 stars

author: Kazuyuki Okuhata
comment: I bought PRO version before to remove the Ad but when I update my phone and  reinstall the app, can't restore my purchase anymore.

author: lala lang
comment: Does not provide predict seats anymore

author: grayisagirl c
comment: Cannot remove favourite stations since last year, keep reappearing after I tap remove

author: ABDUL MAJID
comment: Simple to use. HATE THE ADD...... 😊

author: Gymm Lee
comment: Loved this app! But it will be better if you guys can tell which bus has usb ports.

author: Halina Halina
comment: Tried other apps but this is the best so far. Been using for quite some time. Thumbs up!

author: Elangovan Balusamy
comment: Best ever app,  user friendly and does not ask unwanted user permission compared to other apps in Singapore

author: Wen You Thng
comment: Great app, accurate bus info. It's use of singlish in the app even more localized and close to heart.

author: Zhi-en Tan
comment: Good interface for bus timings, Upp Changi Stn/SUTD bus stop is placed slightly off though

author: David Goh
comment: Dev keeps adding features and responding to feedback. 5/5

author: Lightning 007
comment: NOT ACCURATE AT ALL

author: Kevin Yeoh
comment: The notification stopped working

author: Frans Aw Yang
comment: Great app but the timings are starting to get very unpredictable.

author: Pramendra Singh Dadhwal
comment: Not tested before release eh?

reply.author: Originally US - Mobile App Development Singapore
reply.content: Hi Dadhwal, we are sorry our server was down this morning, but it is ok now. Would you be kind to revise the review? Thanks. In future, if there's no timing, please notify us through the feedback channel in app instead of here so that we can get the message asap. Thanks!

author: Brian TAN
comment: Timing seems to be off by about 2 mins.

reply.author: Originally US - Mobile App Development Singapore
reply.content:
Hi Brian,

We have a long history of providing extra features beyond bus timing with Singaporean flavor. E.g. if you search for "PSI", it gives you the calculated 1-hr PSI that was extremely useful during the haze period.

comment: I loved this app so many singlish just likr dingapore slang sibeiho

author: M Yussuf
comment: Is there a setting to turn off Singlish?

author: Ai Lan Foo
comment: It's convenient and useful but sometimes not accurate..
